data.title: Machine Learning Engineer
data.description: My first journey in software development. I worked with Data Scientists to develop machine learning-based services which improved KBank customer experience, boosted revenue, and reduced manual processes. The projects covered various areas such as credit scoring, OCR, and virtual wallet.

data.title: Data Scientist Intern
data.description: Applied statistics and machine learning knowledge with real-world business problems. Our team identified characteristics of potentially default credit card customers and proposed solutions to prevent credit approval for credit card applicants that obtain such characteristics. We won 1st place in the internship project competition.

data.title: Intern
data.description: Analyzed business performance and financial reports of a company of interest and identified its target stock price. I gained a concrete understanding of a capital market and investment strategy.

data.title: Sales Professional
data.description: Identified consumer needs and set up sales booths in different locations in Bangkok. I achieved the sales target within five weeks out of 11 weeks of the program period.
